price: 3. En leg je vertrouwen in Allah en Allah is voldoende als beschermer.
arabic: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
